full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MI NOR GA-YANG RNAMS PHYIR THON MYUR BKUG PA'I LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES GA-YANG RNAMS PHYIR THON MYUR DU BKUG PA'I LCAGS KYU YID BZHIN NOR BU ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI DGE SLONG NGAG DBANG MKHAS BTZUN BSTAN DAR GYIS SBYAR BA'I DGE BAS SRID ZHI'I LEGS TSOGS 'PHEL BAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
author_simple: NGAG DBANG MKHAS BTZUN BSTAN DAR,
